n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>%USER_NAME%</SCHEMA> <NAME>STA_VW_STUDENT</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ID</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>FIRST_NAME</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LAST_NAME</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DATE_OF_BIRTH</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ADDRESS1</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ADDRESS2</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PHONE_NUMBER1</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CLSS_ID</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>GRDE_ID</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CTKR_ID</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>GENDER</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>REGISTRATION_YEAR</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DEREGISTRATION_YEAR</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ORIGIN_SCHOOL</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select usr.id , usr.first_name , usr.last_name , usr.date_of_birth , usr.address1 , usr.address2 , usr.phone_number1 , usr.clss_id , grde.id grde_id , usr.ctkr_id , usr.gender , usr.registration_year , usr.deregistration_year , usr.origin_school from sta_user usr left join sta_class clss on usr.clss_id = clss.id left join sta_grade grde on clss.grde_id = grde.id join sta_user_role usr_rle on usr.id = usr_rle.usr_id join sta_role rle on usr_rle.rle_id = rle.id where lower(rle.name) = lower('student') and usr.deleted_flg = false</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
